mapper.sql: id, src_db, src_table, src_keys, src_db_type, src_db_version, schema_source, src_db_connection, src_db_user, src_db_password, dbname, table_name, table_type, active, export_to_sql_warehouse, export_to_es_index_warehouse, creator_id, flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.src_db,t.src_table,t.src_db_type,t.dbname,t.table_name,t.create_time,t.update_time,t.active,u.name creator_username,t.creator_id from tb_import_tables t,tb_user u
t.flag=0 and t.creator_id = u.id
and t.src_db like CONCAT ('%',#{src_db,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.src_table like CONCAT('%',#{src_table,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.src_db_type like CONCAT('%',#{src_db_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.dbname like CONCAT('%',#{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.table_name like CONCAT('%',#{table_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.table_type =#{table_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and t.create_time between #{create_time_from,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{create_time_to,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
order by t.id desc
limit #{fromRowId,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{perNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: update tb_import_tables set flag= 1 where id =#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_import_tables (id, src_db, src_table, src_keys, src_db_type, src_db_version, schema_source, src_db_connection, src_db_user, src_db_password, dbname, table_name, table_type, active, export_to_sql_warehouse, export_to_es_index_warehouse, creator_id, flag, create_time, update_time, es_index_schema, process_info) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{src_db,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src_table,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src_keys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src_db_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src_db_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schema_source,jdbcType=BIT}, #{src_db_connection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src_db_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src_db_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{table_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{table_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, #{export_to_sql_warehouse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{export_to_es_index_warehouse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{es_index_schema,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{process_info,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
